title: Stadium construction/renovation costs UEFA EURO 2016
summary: This is a bar chart representing Stadiums in the x axis and Construction/renovation costs in million euros in the y axis.

The Construction/renovation costs in million euros is appeared to be the highest at Stadiums Stade des Lumières Lyon (new stadium) and lowest at Stadiums Stadium Municipal Toulouse (major renovation).
The lowest value at Stadiums Stadium Municipal Toulouse (major renovation) is 6.35x times less than the highest value at Stade des Lumières Lyon (new stadium).
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Construction/renovation costs in million euros for 9 number of Stadiumss.

The maximum Construction/renovation costs in million euros 381.0 is found at Stadiums Stade des Lumières Lyon (new stadium) and the minimum is found at Stadium Municipal Toulouse (major renovation) where Stadiums is 60.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Stadiums in the x axis and Construction/renovation costs in million euros in the y axis.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Stadiums in the x axis and Construction/renovation costs in million euros in the y axis.

The maximum Construction/renovation costs in million euros 381.0 is found at Stadiums Stade des Lumières Lyon (new stadium) and the minimum is found at Stadium Municipal Toulouse (major renovation) where Stadiums is 60.0.
The highest Stadiums Stade des Lumières Lyon (new stadium) has 321.0 more Construction/renovation costs in million euros than the lowest Stadiums Stadium Municipal Toulouse (major renovation).

Stadiums Stade des Lumières Lyon (new stadium) is higher than any other Stadiumss with value 381.0, followed by Grand Stade LMCU Lille (new stadium), and Stade Vélodrome Marseille (major renovation). Down to Stadiums Stadium Municipal Toulouse (major renovation) with the lowest value 60.0.
Similar Construction/renovation costs in million euros is found in Stadiums Stade Bollaert Lens (major renovation), and Stade Geoffroy Guichard Saint-Etienne (major renovation).
The highest value 381.0 at Stade des Lumières Lyon (new stadium) is almost 2.05 times larger than the average value 185.56.
Summing up the values of all Stadiumss, we get total 1670.0.
